body.name: CYBEX Libelle 2 Ultra Compact and Lightweight Baby Pockit Travel Stroller with UPF 50+ Sun Canopy for Babies and Toddlers - Carry-On Luggage Compliant - Compatible with CYBEX Car Seats,Moon Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 55 mins
features: Seat Pad: 95% Polyester Fiber, 5% Polyurethane Foam Pad Harness Covers: 100% Polyester Fiber

THE ULTIMATE TRAVEL STROLLER: Designed to keep up with moms and dads on the go, this adjustable travel-friendly stroller offers a smooth ride and is foldable, self-standing, and easy to set up so you can keep moving without missing a beat
SUN CANOPY WITH UPF 50+ PROTECTION: The CYBEX Libelle 2 comes with an extra large sun canopy with a UPF 50+ rating to shield your child from the sun
CREATE A CONVENIENT TRAVEL SYSTEM: Attach any CYBEX infant car seat (sold separately) to the frame to create a convenient stroller and car seat combo system using included adapters
AIRPLANE CARRY-ON COMPLIANT: This ultra lightweight and compact baby and toddler stroller weighs only 13.7 pounds, folds in seconds, and fits into the overhead bin or under your seat

DESIGNED FOR MODERN PARENTS: CYBEX is a world leader in child safety and makes car seats, baby carriers, kids furniture and strollers that are not only safe but perfectly suited for today's urban lifestyles
body.description: As the lightest ultra-compact stroller in the CYBEX line, the Libelle 2 is designed for everyday adventures. With one of the smallest folds in the world, the Libelle 2 folds into a space-saving package that’s carry-on compliant and easy to store in planes, trains, or cars. Lightweight enough to make carrying a breeze and comfortable for children on the move, the Libelle helps parents make the most out of their journey. CYBEX is the world leader in child safety and makes award-winning car seats, baby carriers, kids furniture and strollers that are not only safe but perfectly suited for today's urban lifestyles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid travel stroller
reviews.reviewText: This is the first and probably only review I will leave on Amazon because this stroller is exactly what I was looking for and checked all the boxes! I’m taking my 3 and half year old child (40 lbs 40 inches tall) on a 30 hours international trip back to my hometown in China. I was looking for a travel stroller that is 1) compact enough to fit in overhead bin, 2) light weight for me to hold single handed, 3) easy smooth folding, 4) allow my big boy to sit and sleep in it comfortably; 5) doesn’t break my bank and doesn’t look like a flimsy piece of sh….I did so much research and bought 3 strollers for my price range to compare: this one, Munchkin sparrow, and Harppe (or some random Chinese brand that only sells for a season on Amazon). This one wins hands down in every aspect, very solid structure, well made with good materials, easiest pushing and folding among all 3, even has a very functional sun shade, unlike a lot of strollers on the market, the shade is basically a decor… If you are looking for a travel stroller for similar reasons, this is IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid choice for a lightweight, small fold, traveller stroller
reviews.reviewText: I really like this stroller! I bought it to guarantee it fit in all overhead compartments for all airlines, so my choices were this or the gb pockit. I read reviews that this one was slightly better than the pockit, and it didn’t disappoint. I tested it on the streets of Rome and a few other European port cities. It handled well. People are typically afraid of cobblestones. The ones you find in populous cities are bumpy but if you have a good sleeper child, they will sleep through it. Might even be soothing. But, there are other cobblestone cities where the stones are different shapes and sizes, and those are probably going to be difficult for any travel stroller.About the stroller - small bottom storage but good enough for a few items, not a full recline but it’s enough for child to sleep and lean head on inner fabric, not a one handed folded but still pretty easy to do quickly, canopy could be bigger but always covered my toddler’s face. I’m probably not doing well advocating for this item, but it seriously did all the things I needed it to and didn’t break. I call that a win.My toddler was 21mo, 33” tall, and about 25lbs at time of travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect lightweight stroller
reviews.reviewText: Folds easily and fits in overhead compartment on the plane. Seems comfy enough for such a compact stroller. Can’t figure out how to make it recline. Assembly was easy but we also def threw some piece away bc we didn’t know what it did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars User friendly and lightweight as advertised
reviews.reviewText: We are a big fan of cybex products; we have the e-Priam, sirona S, and cloud Q, just like every other cybex products we purchased in the past, this one hasn’t disappointed us. It is easy to use and very convenient due its lightweight. I just wish it has a bigger canopy and maybe more storage room underneath but other than that, we really like it. Not as fancy as the e-Priam though but it gets the job done.we, now, also have more trunk room in our car. Also, We can finally ride the tram on Disneyland with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best purchase for being a mom I’ve ever made!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this like 1.5 years ago, I do t have time to write reviews but I purposely have gone back to do it. I bought it for my then 1.5 year old, he is 3 now. We took it to many airports, all sorts of trips to all over. I can flip it out with one hand and fold it up with him standing right by me. When it’s folded it fits in overhead, even though every steward says “you’ll have to check it” then I file it and they are like “that’s amazing!” I can carry it with one hand and child in other no problem, fits on bus transport, subway, etc. Pushing it is easy for my mom, she needs a cane to walk but this substitute’s for her. I go through the airport pushing it with one hand, car seat over shoulder and roll on bag in the other hand. My son finds it comfortable enough… he does slouch in it and always has so not for a child younger than a year old. Yet, he has slept and rides in it just fine. Enough space underneath for his snacks, diapers, sunblock, my water bottle etc. there is no cup holder but I’m not a coffee drinker so it does not bother me at all. If you are going to travel you have to buy this! Best thing I ever bought as a mom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This stroller is great- light weight, small, easy to unfold/fold (easier than the GB Pockit all terrain), the sun shade works well and is sturdy.My 3 complaints1- it would ideally recline more and I think all they would need is to put a just a few more inches of fabric on the sides (maybe 4-5 inches) and extend the recline strap (I think this combined would be less than 1 lb of added weight and would be well worth it.2- No cup holder for parent or baby- but this is easily remedied by many options for added storage- I ended up with "Belle on the go" from BuyBuy Baby. Its a soft neoprene material and it doesn't get in the way when folding up.3- the BIGGEST Fault is that there are not any conversion kits for other brands of infant carriers- if so this would end up being my only stroller and I'd get rid of the other big stroller I got from Graco- as it lays currently- I am not going to spend $300 on a single infant car seat when there are others that have just as good if not better safety ratings for cheaper.Anyways- We have had this about 2 weeks and took it on vacation and loved it. my 18 month old loved it. So it seems to be comfy the basket carries quite a bit and I am glad I made the investment.

L'avantage principal est le fait que cette poussette est vraiment très compacte. Toutefois, il y a plusieurs inconvénients qui font que cette poussette n'en est pas adaptée sur le plan qualité / prix. 1. Trop légère et donc instable. 2. Ne peut pas complétement allongé l'enfant si ce dernier prend une sieste 3. Ne permet pas un bon positionnement en mode assis (enfant tout le temps en mauvaise stature)Dommage que ce soit si cher.

Busque esta carreola por el tamaño compacto, tengo otra cybex pero si tamaño nos complica cuando salimos de viaje y que somos 5 ahora. Y necesitaba una opción de viaje y más compacta pero que pudiera seguir usando el carseat de la misma marca. En este primer mes ha sido excelente por que cubre totalmente al bebé y transportadla es muy fácil y cómodo! Habi leído que no se reclinaba mucho pero creo que el ángulo es el correcto

reviews.reviewTitle: Every parent will be happy to have this
reviews.reviewText: The stroller’s weight is just nice for any mother to carry around. It is so easy to fold it into compact size. The wheels are smooth. The only complaint I have for it would be the handle portion is too light. Without your kid sitting on it, you cannot put too much pressure on the handle or else it will flip.
La más compacta que vi comparando con otras carriolas, la visera está adecuada para proteger de el sol
Me encanto lo fácil que es de guardar y lo resistente que es para ser tan compacta. La hubiera comprado antes.
